data.name: AuthenticationInfoNote
data.value: Note: For more information on authentication with your e-mail server, contact your network administrator.

data.name: BasicAuthDesc
data.value: Choose this option if your e-mail server requires you to explicitly pass a user name and password when sending an e-mail message.

data.name: Instructions
data.value: Use this page to manage SMTP settings, which determine how your Web application sends e-mail. If your e-mail server requires you to log on before you can send an e-mail message, specify the type of authentication that the server requires, and if necessary, the user name and password to use.

data.name: NTLMAuthDesc
data.value: Choose this option if your e-mail server is on a local area network and you connect to it using windows credentials.

data.name: UnexpectedSmtpField
data.value: Unexpected config value for smtpauthenticate field

data.name: NonNegativeServerPort
data.value: * Server port should be a positive integer
